Description: 
------------------- 
It's a new installment in the acclaimed IL-2 Sturmovik series. The game takes place in 1940 during the central battle in the skies overhead Britain from the British, German and Italian air forces. The field lines in the midst of battle. You will join the Royal Air Force to fight the German forces and renegade pilots his own side, or join the German Luftwaffe and participate in meticulously recreated historical battles. Cliffs of Dover has amazingly detailed true to life modeling of aircraft systems on the basis of thousands of hours of dedicated research. Each component plane can only be damaged by the actual results and immensely satisfying. Besides the convincing for one player, a massively multiplayer mode offers a customizable from simple death-match-style free-for-alls to the epic, ongoing, 128 player battles can last hours, days, weeks, or more. Next-generation graphics engine with DX10 and DX11 support of the API, a variety of photorealistic ground vehicles, buildings and other environmental elements to recreate the minutiae of the 1940 European customizable difficulty - Dozens of realistic options that newcomers the franchise to reduce the difficulty and focus on fun while learning the ropes of being a pilot. 

Features: 
------------------------ 
You can fly planes - More than a dozen airplanes English, German and Italian famous and detailed high availability, with all crew positions open to you, all aircraft can fly have been carefully researched, which is within Cabin incredibly accurate (including Spitfire, Hurricane, Messerschmitt and Stuka) 
You can not hang or aircraft - 13 additional aircraft for AI control are also available to allow further experience through accurate and realistic aircraft of varying 
Interactive Training - Interactive Comprehensive training for new players - fly a real plane of World War II training with an instructor computer controlled through a series of training missions 
New Framework - The battle will take place in a large area covering south London and northern England to northern France and Belgium in the south, the large map containing thousands of historic cities, towns, roads, airports , radar stations, ports and industrial zones - all located exactly where they were in 1940 
New 3D engine - the latest generation graphics engine with DX10 and DX11 support of the API, a variety of photorealistic ground vehicles, buildings and other environmental elements to recreate the minutiae of the 1940 European customizable difficulty - Dozens of realistic options that newcomers to the franchise to reduce the difficulty and focus on fun while learning the ropes of being a pilot.
